import './checkout.styles.scss' import { CartContext } from '../context/cart.context' import { useContext } from 'react' const Checkout = () => { const {cartItems, addItemToCart,removeItemToCart} = useContext(CartContext) return (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => { const {id,name,quantity} = cartItem return

{name}

{quantity}
removeItemToCart(cartItem)}>decrement
addItemToCart(cartItem)}>increment
})}
) } export default Checkout
